channel.title: Handmaid's Tale on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Handmaid's Tale on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Handmaid’s Tale’ Star O-T Fagbenle on Elisabeth Moss Emmy Snub for Final Season: ‘It’s an Absolute Tragedy’
item.description: “The Handmaid’s Tale” star O-T Fagbenle is reacting to Elisabeth Moss’s Emmys snub for the Hulu show’s sixth and final season. “It’s a tragedy,” he told me Tuesday at the “Splitsville” premiere at AMC
